column4: Anyone available for some trouble shooting with "apt-get upgrade" (or update-manager for that matter)?
I've some how managed to break apt-get upgrade/ update-manager
what error messages do you get?
rrors were encountered while processing:
/var/cache/apt/archives/libuuid1_2.16-1ubuntu4_i386.deb
E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
root@Poutine:~#
Trijnteje: Sorry for the flood, relatively new to the IRC. do you want me to paste the terminal output?
!paste
http://paste.ubuntu.com/278594/ is the terminal outpute
I did try dpkg-reconfigure -a
what did that do?
Trijntje: it didn't fix the errors that occured. additonally if i do "sudo update-manager -d" it has anotehr set of errors.
did you use sudo with the dpkg-reconfigure?
Trijntje: I did it as root.
Trijntje: I am also using Karmic Koala (9.1)
I see
!karmic | Professor_Chaos
sorry
no problem, you do know that karmic is not stable yet?
